mapper.update: update Account set UsrSn = #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CashBal = #{cashbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EarnBal = #{earnbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FreeBal = #{freebal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FreeSetTime = #{freesettime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where AccSn = #{accsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select AccSn, UsrSn, CashBal, EarnBal, FreeBal, FreeSetTime from Account
